ModMetaData.name: SZ_Floors
ModMetaData.author: void
ModMetaData.description:
last update:2022-10-26 (version 1.4.3528) This mod add twenty one dynamic floors.
MOD FEATURES • 18 floor patterns and 3 giant floors • giant floors are disabled per default and can be enabled under mod options • dynamic supports for all mods that add stones or raw resources to the game • for every stone or raw resource found ingame a series of new floors will be added • unwanted floor patters can be disabled under mod options
MOD OPTIONS • [Floors] costs (Enable/Disable) • [Floors] work to build (Adjustable from 100 to 9999) • [Floors] beauty (Adjustable from 0 to 20) • [Floors] from mineable resources (Enable/Disable) - resources like steel, gold, etc. • [Floors] from raw resources (Enable/Disable) - all mineables + not mineables (like wood) • [Floors] sterile (Enable/Disable) - makes all SZ_Floors sterile, when enabled • Floor tiles by name (Enable/Disable) - unwanted tiles can be disabled • Giant tiles by name (Enable/Disable) - those are (twist, twista, wella)
HOW TO ENABLE GIANT FLOORS 1. Click on 'Options' 2. Click on the green button called 'Mod Settings' 3. Click on 'Open' button for SZ_Floors 4. Scroll down to floors called 'Twist', 'Twista', 'Wella' and activate them 5. Close mod settings and click on 'OK'
LAST UPDATES • 2022-10-26 - fixed shorthash bug (may require fresh game start) • 2022-10-24 - updated to 1.4
